name: timeago.js

2.0.0.name: timeago.js
2.0.0.description: timeago.js is a simple library (only 2kb) to used to format datetime with `*** time ago` statement. eg: '3 hours ago'. localization supported.

scripts.test: npm run lint && node tests/locales_test.js && node tests/test.js

2.0.0.summary: timeago.js is a simple library (less than 2kb) to used to format datetime with `*** time ago` statement. eg: '3 hours ago'.

scripts.test: npm run lint && node tests/locales_test.js && node tests/test.js
scripts.build: gulp mini && webpack && npm run test

4.0.0-beta.1.name: timeago.js
4.0.0-beta.1.description: timeago.js is a simple library (only 2kb) to used to format datetime with `*** time ago` statement. eg: '3 hours ago'. localization supported.

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=babel jest && npm run size
scripts.build:umd: rimraf ./dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c && cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c rollup.config.locales.js
scripts.build:lib: rimraf ./lib && cross-env NODE_ENV=babel babel src -d lib
scripts.build: npm run build:umd && npm run build:lib && npm run test

4.0.0-beta.1.summary: timeago.js is a simple library (less than 2kb) to used to format datetime with `*** time ago` statement. eg: '3 hours ago'.

4.0.0-beta.2.name: timeago.js
4.0.0-beta.2.description: timeago.js is a simple library (only 1kb) to used to format datetime with `*** time ago` statement. eg: '3 hours ago'. localization supported.

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=babel jest --no-cache && npm run size && lint-md ./
scripts.build:umd: rimraf ./dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c && cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c rollup.config.all.js
scripts.build:lib: rimraf ./lib && cross-env NODE_ENV=babel babel src -d lib
scripts.build: npm run build:umd && npm run build:lib && npm run test
